classDescription:
Classes marked “Flow” will move with the breath from pose 
													to pose and have a more dynamic pace (also known as Vinyasa Yoga). 
													Our Hatha Yoga classes are instructional, insightful, and 
													appropriate to your degree of yoga experience. The state of yoga is 
													defined simply as having a one-pointed, focused mind. Hatha Yoga 
													uses physical postures and other practices to find this state. 
													A well-established practice with ancient roots, yoga is supported by 
													modern science and embraced all over the globe.
levelDescription:
All Levels classes embrace the range of levels, with modifications
													and opportunities to intensify or simplify as needed.
